item.title: Please help me=(
item.dc:creator: @arrie123 arrie123
item.description:
@arrie123 wrote:

for donator go to more info and clik player name in your server files and for the firecape command i will make 1 for you now ok :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 08, 2009, 12:11:51 pm[/size][hr]here you go add this is your client.java file on your server files

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“firecape”)&& playerRights >= 0){ //Voule Command Generator if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“firecape”)){ //Voule Command Generator <---- ad that line onto end of top line
pEmote = 0811;
addItem(6570,1);
sendMessage(“here is your firecape :)”);

}
